xbel.title: Supporting Software
xbel.desc: Some supporting software is provided as part of the Python XML "omnibus" package. This software is located in the demo/xbel/ directory of the distribution. This includes command-line processes for converting XBEL instances to other common formats, including the Navigator and Internet Explorer formats. The following bookmarks refer to other XBEL software.

bookmark.title: XBELicious
bookmark.desc: XBELicious is a set of scripts to help you store your del.icio.us bookmarks in XBEL format and to mold those bookmarks into a hierarchy of folders based partly upon the tags that you have given to those bookmarks.

bookmark.title: BookmarkBridge
bookmark.desc: Ken Schenke's BookmarkBridge is an open source bookmark management tool. It is used to merge bookmarks from different browsers, and uses Python for at least a portion of it's regression testing.

bookmark.title: Python Recipe: Merging XBEL Bookmark Files
bookmark.desc: Merging XBEL Bookmark files, by Uche Ogbuji, is a Python recipe for merging 2 XBEL files.

bookmark.title: XBELette
bookmark.desc: XBELette, a "Client-server solution for managing your bookmarks".

folder.title: XBEL-Aware Web Browsers and Web Browser Plugins

bookmark.title: Galeon
bookmark.desc: The Galeon Web browser for the GNOME desktop has been using XBEL as its native bookmark format since version 1.1.

bookmark.title: Grail Internet Browser
bookmark.desc: The current release of the Grail Internet browser from CNRI supports XBEL as a native bookmarks format.

bookmark.title: Konqueror
bookmark.desc: David Faure (faure@kde.com) has made XBEL the bookmarks format for Konqueror, the KDE web browser since KDE 2.1. KDE also features a separate application to edit XBEL bookmarks, keditbookmarks.

bookmark.title: ELinks
bookmark.desc: ELinks, ad advanced text WWW browser, has built-in XBEL bookmarks support. Basic bookmarks operations (same as in the native format) and conversion from/to native ELinks' bookmarks format.

bookmark.title: linkaGoGo
bookmark.desc: linkaGoGo is a commercial online bookmark/favorites "service" which supports import and export in several formats, including XBEL.

bookmark.title: URL Manager Pro
bookmark.desc: Alco Blom's URL Manager Pro, a Mac OS shareware application for managing bookmarks, supports reading files in the XBEL format. See the home page of URL Manager Pro for more information.

bookmark.title: Favorez
bookmark.desc: Favorez is an AxtiveX IE 5+ plug-in program that creates web pages from the users' favorites. It uses XBEL, and includes an XSLT stylsheet for converting XBEL to a dynamic folder-based view.

bookmark.title: A PHP Script to Parse XBEL and a Compass Template that Maintains Foldering Information
bookmark.desc: Roberto Giungato (roberto.giungato@its.it) has created a PHP script to parse XBEL and a Compass template that maintains foldering information. See his home page for more information.

bookmark.title: Opera to XBEL
bookmark.desc: OperaToXBEL.py is a Python script for converting Opera bookmarks to XBEL, by Eddy L O Jansson.

bookmark.title: XML::Filter::Glossary
bookmark.desc: XML::Filter::Glossary, a Per SAX2 filter for keyword lookup and replacement, with support primarily for XBEL files.

bookmark.title: Apache::XBEL
bookmark.desc: Apache::XBEL is an Apache mod_perl handler that uses XSLT to transform XBEL files into dynamic HTML documents.

bookmark.title: Net::Delicious::Export::Post::XBEL
bookmark.desc: Net-Delicious-Export-Post-XBEL is a Perl module to export del.icio.us postings as XBEL SAX events.

bookmark.title: Assorted things XBEL
bookmark.desc: Rowan Rodrik has a collection of XBEL tools, including a set of XSLT sheets to transform an XBEL file to a directory of XHTML files or one, big monolithic XHTML file; and an XSLT sheet to alphabetically sort an XBEL file.

bookmark.title: Rebel: A RE(ST API for X)BEL
bookmark.desc: Rebel: A RE(ST API for X)BEL is a convention proposed for managing the XBEL hierarchicy, and accessing this hierarchy using URL conventions.

folder.title: 404 Tools
folder.desc: Tools which no longer (as of 2006-07-06) seem to exist on the web.

bookmark.title: Export Template for the Compass Bookmarks Manager
bookmark.desc: Philippe Guglielmetti (goulu@i.am) has created an export template for the Compass bookmarks manager. Look for XBEL.TPL at Philippe's home page.

bookmark.title: XBEL Bookmarks Editor
bookmark.desc: XBEL Bookmarks Editor is "a platform and browser bookmark representation that allows content-based retrieval. A platform [independent] application [for easy] bookmark [management]."

bookmark.title: be Bookmarks Editor
bookmark.desc: be Bookmarks Editor is a Java-based editor to manage bookmarks in XBEL format.

bookmark.title: op2xbel.pl
bookmark.desc: op2xbel.pl is a Perl script Dan Loda wrote to convert Opera bookmarks to XBEL.

bookmark.title: xbel-1.0.xsl
bookmark.desc: xbel-1.0.xsl is an XSLT script by JÃ¼rgen Hermann for converting an XBEL document into a HTML directory.

bookmark.title: Parsing XBEL with PHP
bookmark.desc: Waitman C. Gobble, II has posted a sample of PHP code to parse XBEL, in particular XBEL bookmarks generated by Firefox.
